triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper applies reinforcement learning theory to the specific domain of POMDPs.

triples.name: Partially observable Markov decision process
triples.relevance: POMDPs are the core problem domain that the paper addresses with gradient-based optimization.

triples.name: Gradient descent
triples.relevance: The paper proposes GPOMDP, a novel gradient ascent method for directly optimizing policy performance in POMDPs.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: The paper builds on policy gradient methods by proposing GPOMDP, a novel policy gradient algorithm for POMDPs.

triples.name: Markov chain
triples.relevance: Markov chains underpin the mathematical framework of POMDPs and the convergence analysis.

triples.name: Stochastic gradient descent
triples.relevance: SGD principles inform the stochastic nature of gradient estimation in the GPOMDP algorithm.

triples.name: Conjugate gradient method
triples.relevance: The paper proposes using conjugate-gradient procedures to find local optima of the average reward.
